scripts.start:api: cd ./packages/nocodb; npm install; cross-env NC_DISABLE_TELE=true npm run watch:run
scripts.start:web: cd ./packages/nc-gui; npm install; npm run dev
scripts.test:travis: git log --pretty=format:'%h' -n 1 --skip 1 | xargs  lerna run test:travis --since
scripts.lerna:install: git log --pretty=format:'%h' -n 1 --skip 1 | xargs  lerna bootstrap --ignore nc-cli --since
scripts.updated:xc-migrator: lerna run publish --scope xc-migrator && lerna run xc && lerna publish && npm install -f xc-cli
scripts.install:local:dep: cd packages/nc-lib-gui;npm uninstall -S xc-lib;rm package-lock.json; npm i ../../../xc-lib-private; cd ../xc-instant;npm uninstall -S xc-lib xc-lib-gui;npm i ../../../xc-lib-private;npm i ../xc-lib-gui
scripts.install:npm:dep: cd packages/nc-lib-gui;npm uninstall -S xc-lib; npm i -S xc-lib@latest; cd ../xc-instant;npm uninstall -S xc-lib xc-lib-gui;npm i -S xc-lib@latest xc-lib-gui@latest;npm i ../xc-lib-gui
